testcase.name: Add product to cart from product listing page
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When the user enters a valid product name in the search field...............passed And click "search" button...................................................passed And the user selects a product from the listing.............................passed And click "Add to Cart" button..............................................passed Then system should show success message.....................................passed

testcase.name: View product in cart after adding
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When the user enters a valid product name in the search field...............passed And click "search" button...................................................passed And click "Add to Cart" button..............................................passed And the user navigates to the cart page.....................................passed Then the cart page should display the added product.........................passed

testcase.name: Search product using invalid product name
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When the user enters an invalid product name in the search field............passed And click "search" button...................................................passed Then the no results found message should be displayed.......................passed

testcase.name: Search product without entering product name
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When click "search" button..................................................passed Then system should display alert............................................passed
